body.p:
To His Excellency
Thomas E Bramlette Govenor of Ky

We the undersigned citizens of Madison County would respectfully represent that at the term of the Madison Circuit Court 186 John Wilson a citizen of this County was indicted in said Court for Larceny and was admitted to bail in the sum of One hundred and fifty dollars And Rice Portwood entered as his surety upon the bond, Wilson is a criple for life was a Member of the 7th Ky Cavalry, At the March Term 1865 of said Court Judgment was rendered upon a forfeiture of said bond and Portwood will have to pay the Money as Wilson has left the state without any estate here
Portwood is a poor man, with a large familly And we would respectfully request that you remit said fine. We believe it a fit case for Executive Clemency
